ChunkText: keep in mind foreign currencies cannot be used in the u.s. isss will host representatives from pnc bank before the semester begins who can aid students with setting up a bank account if they wish.
ContextBefore: if you anticipate bringing large sums of money to the united states, ask a bank about the safest and most convenient means of carrying or transferring funds. travelers checks are a convenient and safe way of transporting funds.
